name: Dreadice
description:
This is a game for the Minijam Game Jam. The theme was Dread and the limit was that dice must be a mechanic.

The game plays like a board game (and I was out of time to automate it)

Grab a friend and play!

  • Roll the dice with the "Roll" button. Choose one to be your movement (move the number of spaces as indicated by the die you choose, in any direction)
  • Press "Spacebar" the number indicated on the other die (this will move the death wall closer to the other corner)
  • If at any time, a player's piece is on the same tile as the death wall (big red wall), it is removed and the other player wins!
  • Press ESC to close the game

Keep in mind this is a roughly made game, so it might be hard to tell which number the dice land on, just roll again if that happens.
If I were to go on making the game, I'd add automation, as well as different abilities/items to alter the dice rolled. I'd also add some different maps and whatnot
